actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Mathias with amendments. With written report No. 97-433.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 616.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Smithsonian Institution to construct a building for the Museum of African Art and a center for Eastern art together with structures for related educational activities in the area south of the original Smithsonian Institution building adjacent to Independence Avenue at Tenth Street, Southwest, in the city of Washington.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 97-433) Authorizes the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to construct a building for the Museum of African Art and a center for Eastern art in the same area south of the original Smithsonian Institution Building, Washington, D.C. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1983. Prohibits the expenditure of funds other than for planning or consulting until enough money is available from non-Federal sources to complete the buildings.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Smithsonian Institution to construct a building for the Museum of African Art and a center for Eastern art together with structures for related educational activities in the area south of the original Smithsonian Institution building adjacent to Independence Avenue at Tenth Street, Southwest, in the city of Washington.
